reviews.review:
Absolutely great game to play with friends at 3am. It might not be scary, but when you really get into the game it feels like a real horror game which can get you out of your chair!

8/10 would recommend!

*some bugs here and there, but not major*

basically in short and simple terms the game is random and i like it personally the survivor side is a challenge if you do it solo and with the right killer it can be a real challenge being a killer is nerve racking depending on what the survivors do since same time if the survivors work together its their game but if the killer somehow keeps them seperated its the killers game same time both sides require some work and time and all that is what makes the game a bit more fun than your usual multiplayer games just a small and quick tip: dont take it seriously which should apply to everything if you take video games seriously i suggest you to take a break from video games and focus on whats fun
I thought i would hate it tbh but its really fun KILLER IS REALLY FUN

IT WONT LET ME UPDATE FIX ITR

Ich finde die neusten Veränderungen des Spiels extrem schlecht. Ein Spiel, welches sehr gut dafür war entspannt ein, zwei Runden zu spielen oder durch den Erfolg aus den Vormonaten ein, zwei Ränge zu überwinden, ist zu einem unmotivierenden und überladenden Spiel geworden. Kurz bevor es vor, ich glaube 4 Monaten einen richtigen und auch sich abzeichnenden Hype erfahren hat, war das Spiel aufgeräumt mit den Quest als daily und den Rängen als monthly angenehm motivierend. Dieser gefühlte Zwang durch den Hard Reset jeden Monat, macht jeden monatlichen Neuanfang so viel ätzender für Spieler, die das Spiel mal zwischendurch einen Abend spielen können und frustrierender (woraus sich meines Befindens mehr toxicity ergibt). Ohne auf das MM einzugehen ist die Konzeptveränderung leider eher zu Gunsten einer unentspannten Spielatmosphäre.
so this game was cool. and executioner and shape and nemesis demogorgon trickster are good, and this game is good, everything is good.

This game is pretty fun, been playing it for about 3 days now and I'm really into it already. if i could say one thing that's not good about the game is the loading time because some times it takes so long i just quit and restart the game.

Я оценил продукт, но многие в этой игре не просидят и сотни часов.
У игры порой баги после обновлений, катка из-за маньяка, который слился: будет долго грузится и потом закончится. Геймплей посредственный как и графика, особенно это заметно на выживших. Гринд не самый большой, но далеко не самый маленький, так что спасают донаты, которые к слову символические.
Из плюсов, ну играется более менее бодренько, помогает держать себя в руках в тяжёлых ситуациях и работать по стелсу.

easy to learn and hard to have no room for improvement
the gameplay as killer and survivor is very exicting and fast paced
there is lots of different charecters that can do many different things and once you find one that fits your playstyle you can lose hours in the game having fun
it is a well made horror game that doesn't throw in cheap jumpscares (none at all)
there are also ways to level up charecters you like playing as and gain even more things to customize both as survivor and killer
this game is at laest worth a try especialy if its on sale

After finally reaching 500 hours on PC alone (probably only 1/5 of my play time on playstation) I feel like I kinda have to review this game. Dead by Daylight is an awesome game to play with your friends, you can even kill each-other in custom game if you have 5 people. Every time I've played this game with friends I've had fun. It's also very satisfying to play competitively, but it can be very, VERY frustrating at times, especially if you play killer in this game. One of my only complaints is that this game is an absolute cesspit of toxicity. You might think I'm joking but, I would say it's equally as toxic as rainbow six siege. ESPECIALLY if you're playing killer. Being a new killer is the most mentally straining thing a person can do on this game. It will continue to be frustrating even when you get better, however, I really enjoy playing killer. It's not all bad, but I'd feel downright criminal if I didn't warn you about how harsh this game and people who play it can be. Also, this game has a little bit of general RNG to it. Totem placements and map randomization can pre-determine how easy or hard your game will be. (and even how fair) So keep that in mind. With all of my dislikes being mentioned, I still want to encourage you to try out this game. It's really fun if you can brush off the toxic people, and realize that it can and will be frustrating at times. The best asymmetrical horror game I have ever played, no contest. It only gets more and more fun as you play, it may be confusing and maybe even boring as you start, but I highly, highly recommend trying it out! This game goes on sale a lot, so if you see that blue percentage next to the pricing of this game, definitely go for it! It's super fun with friends, it's rewarding to play competitively (ahaha we don't talk about solo queue but I mean hey, that's pretty bad in any game) and it only gets better overtime!

It's fun if you can look past the toxicity of the player-base. You would be amazed at how many people complain about basic mechanics of the game. I recommend just disabling the in-game chat, and playing the game however you enjoy it most.

Das Spiel ist am Anfang stark gestartet mit einer guten Balance zwischen den beiden Spielparteien mittlerweile ist es so stark zu Gunsten des Killers ausgelegt, dass mir das Killer spielen komplett vergangen ist. Perks werden bei jedem Patch bis zur Nutzlosigkeit verändert Charakter-addons sind von wertvollen Tools zu nutzlosen Gimmicks reduziert worden und davon, dass das Spiel viel zu hell geworden ist wollen wir gar nicht erst anfangen. PS gut gemeinter Rat an den Publisher an dieser stelle wenn die Spieler rum heulen, dass 
 das Spiel zu schwer ist, gebt ihnen die Dark Souls Antwort. Get Good.

The game is fun, but it has one mode.... and said mode is not even that creative. Considering that the survivor's objective is to escape, it's pretty sad that the devs could only come up with power generators. Also there are certain flaws in the game that the survivors can exploit to avoid getting caught by the killer, it's looks pretty stupid when the killer can't catch you because he is unable to climb over anything that's taller than a window
